Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Greenwood, 76th, South Chicago and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Greenwood, 76th, South Chicago and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Greenwood.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
